product_name: APPALACHIAN TRAIL CONSERVANCY Appalachian Trail Guide: Maine - 15th Edition - Guidebook and Maps
long_description: The updated edition of Appalachian Trail Guide: Maine offers essential knowledge to help you plan a complete thru-hike of the Appalachian Trail and includes 7 trail-ready maps.
short_description: The updated edition of Appalachian Trail Guide: Maine offers essential knowledge to help you plan a complete thru-hike of the Appalachian Trail and includes 7 trail-ready maps.
